content: Väitös: Merkit lukihäiriöstä voidaan tunnistaa vastasyntyneiden aivoissa txrissan@helsinki.fi Thu, 05/02/2026 - 11:28 Väitöskirjatutkijamme Sergio Navarrete Arroyo väitteli lukivaikeuden varhaisesta tunnistamisesta ja vauvan aivotoiminnan yhteyksistä myöhemmän lukutaidon kehitykseen perjantaina 24.10. title: Peixin Nie defended her PhD thesis
content: Peixin Nie defended her PhD thesis txrissan@helsinki.fi Thu, 05/02/2026 - 11:22 Peixin Nie defended her PhD thesis on Sept. 5th, titled "The Potential Transfer Effect of Music Learning on Verbal Working Memory: Modulations by Native Language Background?" The studies investigated the transfer effects of music learning in Finnish speakers and Mandarin Chinese speakers  and the potential interactions between music and language. content: Love Data Week 9.-13.2.2026 uvirolai@helsinki.fi Wed, 04/02/2026 - 15:47 The Nordic Love Data Week 2026 offers a wide range of online events organized by research data management experts from Nordic universities.
